pullRequest.title: [DOC] New deployment and upgrade guide
pullRequest.bodyText:
Signed-off-by: prmellor pmellor@redhat.com
Documentation update
Description
New Deploying and Upgrading Strimzi Guide
Changes include a restructure of the files used and some changes to the Using Guide. The Getting Started section of the Using Guide uses the same structure and content as the new guide, but this can be dropped later.
NOTES
Deployment Guide

Deployment procedures used in deployment guide (and getting started) -- no config content
Restructured deployment-specific content into deployment categories
Updated and made consistent the current content
Moved the getting started assemblies/modules under deploy
Created a new Create the Kafka cluster assembly: includes deploying CO and Kafka cluster
Moved the minikube and minishift into deploy prep section

Using Guide:

Deployment info feeds into Getting Started (we can remove later)
Custom Resource status info moves to the Managing Strimzi chapter
Dropped the repeated intros to the operators. Put at the top
Dropped the Operator deployment sections from the Operators chapters + added links to deployments
Upgrading and Introducing Metrics sections dropped and used in Deploying Guide
Took out the repeated Kafka Connect + S2I image deployment section
Added option for MirrorMaker 2.0 deployment
New Upgrading categories for assemblies and modules
Kept the minikube and minishift in appendix
Reduced the number of files by rearranging assembles/modules
Removed mini appendices

Checklist
Please go through this checklist and make sure all applicable tasks have been done

 Update/write design documentation in ./design
 Write tests
 Make sure all tests pass
 Update documentation
 Check RBAC rights for Kubernetes / OpenShift roles
 Try your changes from Pod inside your Kubernetes and OpenShift cluster, not just locally
 Reference relevant issue(s) and close them after merging
 Update CHANGELOG.md
